about_the_game:
"Abomin-Agency! is a party game for 3 to 8 players set in Dr. Frankenstein's Monster-Building Factory in the not-so-distant future. Clients from all over come to Dr. Frankenstein's factory for custom-tailored monsters, and players compete for their business. Each player receives a slew of monster body parts and are tasked with designing the best monster for the job in order to earn their next big pay day.


PLEASE NOTE: Abomin-Agency! is a local multiplayer game that can also be played with remote players online (VERY easily). It's perfect for Online Game Nights, Community Game Streams, Virtual Happy Hours, etc.!"

short_description: Abomin-Agency! is a party game for 3 to 8 players. Players compete to design the 'best monster for the job' for the clients of Dr. Frankenstein's Super Fantastical Monster Factory. Design & pitch your creation to your fellow players to win the big pay day!
